Title: NAV Metro
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Dynamics NAV 2013 Metro App framework.

This is a framework to help get started writing Windows 8 Metro apps for Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2013. It's currently using the OData interface to read data, but you could extend it to use Web Services to update data as well.

Import the Queries.txt from downloads which are the queries used by this framework.
Add the following web services in NAV after importing the objects to get the framework to run:

Object Type Object ID Service Name Published
Query 50001 Metro_BankAccount Yes
Query 50004 Metro_Customer Yes
Query 50007 Metro_GLAccount Yes
Query 50002 Metro_GLEntry Yes
Query 50005 Metro_Item Yes
Query 50003 Metro_Vendor Yes
